---
name: rollout-migration
description: Propose a safe rollout/migration plan with monitoring and rollback steps.
---

# Skill: Rollout / Migration Plan

## Goal
Make rollout safe and reversible.

## How to use (prompt)

```text
Propose a rollout/migration plan for this change.

Include:
- Backward compatibility strategy
- Data migration steps (if any)
- Feature flags / phased rollout (if relevant)
- Monitoring/alerts to watch
- Rollback plan

Keep it realistic and minimal.
```
